data.text: @GovSisolak Michele Fiore for Gov of Nevada
@GovSisolak @unlv @ACDCNV Michele Fiore for Gov of Nevada

@UNLVRebelGrl @Commonsenseluv2 @Patriots_Free__ @SADM_MK54 @GovSisolak @unlv @ACDCNV Let's go to the voting booth together and vote Sisolak out. You sound like a democRAT! I want to see what button you push

@Commonsenseluv2 @Patriots_Free__ @SADM_MK54 @EricChampagne5 @GovSisolak @unlv @ACDCNV When did I ever say money was everything? I said we should be prepared and take responsibility for themselves and not expect anyone else to bail them out or pay their bills.
@UNLVRebelGrl @Patriots_Free__ @SADM_MK54 @EricChampagne5 @GovSisolak @unlv @ACDCNV Point is, money isn't everything. Some things matter more.
@Commonsenseluv2 @Patriots_Free__ @SADM_MK54 @EricChampagne5 @GovSisolak @unlv @ACDCNV Point is people need to be personally responsible and accountable.

@Commonsenseluv2 @Patriots_Free__ @SADM_MK54 @EricChampagne5 @GovSisolak @unlv @ACDCNV Everyone suffered during covid. Some people were more prepared financially then others. If people failed to find other jobs when we know there are a lot of available and instead chose to take the Biden bribe that's on them. There were plenty of resources and moratoriums to help

@UNLVRebelGrl @Patriots_Free__ @SADM_MK54 @EricChampagne5 @GovSisolak @unlv @ACDCNV Some of us lost our dream jobs due to the 2 weeks slowing the spread taking months. So it's not always about sitting around waiting for unemployment. Some lives were ruined because of what was taken away from them. maybe you should understand what others have lost b4 u speak JS
